data.name: Dashboard_IntegratedGrcSystem
data.value: Integrated Governance, Risk, and Compliance System

data.name: WelcomeToGrc
data.value: Welcome to the Governance, Risk, and Compliance Management System

data.name: GrcPlatformDescription
data.value: Comprehensive platform for managing governance, risk, and compliance

data.name: PleaseLoginMessage
data.value: Please log in to access the dashboard and manage your organization's governance, risk, and compliance activities.

data.name: RiskManagementDescription
data.value: Identify, assess, and mitigate risks across your organization with our comprehensive risk management tools.

data.name: ComplianceTrackingDescription
data.value: Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and internal policies through automated tracking and reporting.

data.name: PerformanceAnalyticsDescription
data.value: Monitor your GRC performance with real-time dashboards and comprehensive analytics.

data.name: WantToExplore
data.value: Want to explore the platform first?

data.name: AI_OpportunityToImproveText
data.value: 3 similar controls detected in NCA-ECC and SAMA-CSF frameworks. Evidence can be merged to reduce effort by 40%.

data.name: AI_RenewalDateComingText
data.value: ISO 27001 certificate expires in 45 days. It is recommended to start the renewal process now.

data.name: Alert_CriticalControlNotAppliedDesc
data.value: Privileged Access Management - Must be addressed within 48 hours

data.name: Alert_ComplianceDeadlineMissedDesc
data.value: Periodic SAMA assessment is 5 days overdue

data.name: Alert_EvidenceExpiredDesc
data.value: 3 evidence items need update - last review 6 months ago

data.name: Auth_StrongPasswordHint
data.value: Password must be at least 6 characters long and contain uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters.

data.name: Auth_EnterEmailReset
data.value: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.

data.name: Auth_ResetPasswordSentMessage
data.value: Password reset link has been sent to your email address.

data.name: Auth_LinkValid24Hours
data.value: Link is valid for 24 hours only

data.name: Auth_PasswordResetSuccessfulMessage
data.value: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in with your new password.

data.name: Auth_UseStrongPassword
data.value: For security reasons, please use a strong password that includes uppercase letters, numbers, and special characters.

data.name: Auth_ContactSupport
data.value: If you didn't request a password reset or have any concerns, please contact our support team.

data.name: Auth_PasswordMinLengthHint
data.value: Password must be at least 6 characters long.

data.name: Auth_EnterEmailRetrieveTenantId
data.value: Enter your email address to retrieve your Tenant ID

data.name: Auth_CopyTenantIdHint
data.value: Copy this Tenant ID and use it to log in

data.name: Auth_TenantIdNotFoundMessage
data.value: We couldn't find a Tenant ID associated with this email address, or you don't have admin access. Please verify your email and password, or contact your system administrator for assistance.

data.name: Auth_EnterEmailTenantAdmin
data.value: Enter the email address associated with your tenant admin account

data.name: Auth_EnterPasswordVerify
data.value: Enter your password to verify your identity

data.name: Auth_CredentialsTemporaryNote
data.value: Note: These credentials are temporary and may expire. If your credentials have expired, please contact the system owner.

data.name: Auth_MustChangePassword
data.value: For security reasons, you must change your password before continuing.

data.name: Auth_PasswordEncryptedSecure
data.value: Your password is encrypted and secure

data.name: Auth_AccountLockedMessage
data.value: Your account has been temporarily locked due to multiple failed login attempts.

data.name: Auth_TryAgainLater
data.value: Please try again later or contact support if you need immediate assistance.

data.name: Auth_AccessDeniedMessage
data.value: You do not have permission to access this resource.

data.name: Auth_ContactAdministrator
data.value: If you believe you should have access to this page, please contact your system administrator.

data.name: Auth_EnterAuthenticatorCode
data.value: Your login is protected with an authenticator app. Enter your authenticator code below.

data.name: Auth_NoAccessToAuthenticator
data.value: Don't have access to your authenticator device? You can log in with a recovery code.

data.name: Auth_LoginWithRecoveryCode
data.value: log in with a recovery code

data.name: Auth_RecoveryCodeLoginMessage
data.value: You have requested to log in with a recovery code. This login will not be remembered until you provide an authenticator app code at login or disable 2FA and log in again.

data.name: Auth_VerificationCodeSent
data.value: Verification code has been sent to your email

data.name: Auth_AccountProtectionPriority
data.value: Protecting your account is our priority

data.name: Auth_ViewManageAccountSettings
data.value: View and manage your account settings

data.name: Auth_EnhancedSecurityInfo
data.value: Enhanced Security: This login uses crypto-safe session management and structured logging.

data.name: Auth_EnterTenantIdUsernamePassword
data.value: Enter your Tenant ID, Username, and Password to access onboarding

data.name: Auth_TenantIdProvided
data.value: Your Tenant ID was provided when your account was created.

data.name: Auth_SessionBasedTenantClaims
data.value: Enhanced Security: This login uses session-based tenant claims (not persisted to database).

data.name: Auth_TenantContextInSession
data.value: Tenant context stored in session (NOT database)

data.name: Auth_FixesClaimsBug
data.value: Fixes bug: Claims no longer persist to AspNetUserClaims table

data.name: Auth_NoDatabaseOverhead
data.value: No database overhead for tenant context

data.name: Landing_Title
data.value: Shahin Platform - Governance, Risk, and Compliance System

data.name: Landing_MetaDescription
data.value: Shahin Platform - Integrated system for managing governance, risk, and compliance for Saudi Arabia. Compatible with Vision 2030 and supports 130+ regulatory bodies.

data.name: Landing_HeroBadge
data.value: Leading GRC Platform in the Kingdom

data.name: Landing_HeroSubtitle
data.value: Integrated platform for managing governance, risk, and compliance with full support for Saudi regulatory frameworks and national cybersecurity standards

data.name: Landing_MostSaudiOrganizations
data.value: Most Saudi organizations face the same challenges in managing compliance and risk

data.name: Landing_DataFragmentationDesc
data.value: Compliance information scattered across Excel files, emails, and various folders

data.name: Landing_TimeWasteDesc
data.value: Long hours wasted manually collecting evidence and searching for documents for audits

data.name: Landing_ComplianceRisksDesc
data.value: Large financial fines and reputational damage from not tracking regulatory requirements

data.name: Landing_SkillsGapDesc
data.value: Difficulty finding qualified compliance experts and high cost of training and recruitment

data.name: Landing_ShahinSolvesAll
data.value: Shahin platform solves all these challenges in one integrated platform

data.name: Landing_EverythingYouNeed
data.value: Everything you need in one platform

data.name: Landing_ComprehensivePlatform
data.value: Comprehensive platform for managing governance, risk, and compliance with integrated tools for all your organization's requirements

data.name: Landing_ComplianceManagementDesc
data.value: Comprehensive compliance tracking with all Saudi and international regulatory frameworks

data.name: Landing_RiskManagementDesc
data.value: Professional risk assessment and analysis with interactive heat maps

data.name: Landing_AuditManagementDesc
data.value: Efficient planning and execution of internal and external audit operations

data.name: Landing_WorkflowEngineDesc
data.value: Process and approval automation with advanced workflow engine

data.name: Landing_PolicyManagementDesc
data.value: Create, distribute, and track policies and regulatory procedures

data.name: Landing_VendorManagementDesc
data.value: Assess and track third-party and vendor risks

data.name: Landing_SmartAlertsDesc
data.value: Automatic notifications and alerts for deadlines and due tasks

data.name: Landing_ActionPlansDesc
data.value: Manage and track remediation plans and continuous improvement

data.name: Landing_RegulatoryFrameworksDesc
data.value: Comprehensive library of Saudi and international regulatory frameworks

data.name: Landing_AdvancedSecurityDesc
data.value: Advanced encryption and multi-level access control

data.name: Landing_IntegrationDesc
data.value: Easy integration with existing systems and cybersecurity tools

data.name: Landing_DashboardsDesc
data.value: Interactive dashboards with advanced reports and charts

data.name: Landing_ShahinDesignedForSaudi
data.value: Shahin platform is specifically designed for the Saudi market with advanced technologies you won't find in any other platform

data.name: Landing_ContactTitle
data.value: We'd love to hear from you

data.name: Landing_ContactSubtitle
data.value: Whether you have a question, suggestion, or want to learn more about our services, our team is ready to help you.

data.name: Landing_FAQSubtitle
data.value: Answers to the most common questions about Shahin platform

data.name: Landing_TermsSubtitle
data.value: Agreement for using Shahin platform for governance, risk, and compliance management

data.name: Landing_PrivacySubtitle
data.value: We adhere to the highest data protection standards in accordance with Saudi and international regulations

data.name: Risk_DeleteWarning
data.value: Warning! Are you sure you want to delete this risk? This action cannot be undone.

data.name: Landing_Index_Timeline_Step1_Desc
data.value: Identify applicable regulatory frameworks and get instant assessment of current compliance status

data.name: Landing_Index_Timeline_Step2_Desc
data.value: Design compliance roadmap and define required controls and policies for each framework

data.name: Landing_Index_Timeline_Step3_Desc
data.value: Execute compliance plan with evidence collection, process documentation, and continuous progress tracking

data.name: Landing_Index_Timeline_Step4_Desc
data.value: Continuously monitor compliance status with smart alerts, periodic reports, and audit readiness

data.name: Landing_Index_Regulators_Title
data.value: Full Support for Saudi Regulatory Requirements

data.name: Landing_Index_Regulators_Subtitle
data.value: Compliant with all regulatory frameworks and standards issued by Saudi government entities

data.name: Landing_Index_CTA_Subtitle
data.value: 7-day free trial with full features. No credit card required.

data.name: FreeTrial_PageTitle
data.value: Free GRC Trial — Start in Minutes

data.name: FreeTrial_HeroTitle
data.value: Free GRC Trial — Start in Minutes

data.name: FreeTrial_HeroSubtitle1
data.value: A real GRC environment with guided onboarding.

data.name: FreeTrial_HeroSubtitle2
data.value: No credit card. No setup friction.

data.name: FreeTrial_Bullet1
data.value: Real workflows, not a sandbox demo

data.name: FreeTrial_Bullet2
data.value: Guided onboarding based on your role

data.name: FreeTrial_HelperText
data.value: You'll receive a one-time code to verify access.

data.name: FreeTrial_Explore_Card1_Desc
data.value: Connect risks to controls and see how they relate in practice

data.name: FreeTrial_Explore_Card2_Desc
data.value: Manage evidence collection with ownership and deadlines

data.name: FreeTrial_Explore_Card3_Desc
data.value: Prepare for audits with structured workflows

data.name: FreeTrial_Step1_Desc
data.value: Verify your email and receive instant access to the platform

data.name: FreeTrial_Step2_Desc
data.value: We tailor the experience to your role and priorities

data.name: FreeTrial_Step3_Desc
data.value: Try actual GRC workflows — not just a demo environment

data.name: FreeTrial_Step4_Desc
data.value: Your perspective helps us improve the platform

data.name: FreeTrial_FAQ1_Answer
data.value: Yes, designed to reflect real operational workflows — not a limited sandbox.

data.name: FreeTrial_FAQ2_Question
data.value: Do I need to set up anything?

data.name: FreeTrial_FAQ2_Answer
data.value: No, the guided onboarding takes you through everything step by step.

data.name: FreeTrial_FAQ3_Answer
data.value: Yes, instantly. You have full control over your trial access.

data.name: FreeTrial_FAQ4_Answer
data.value: All data is encrypted and access is controlled with time-limited tokens.

data.name: FreeTrial_FinalTitle
data.value: Ready to See GRC in Action?

data.name: FreeTrial_FinalDesc
data.value: Start your free trial and explore real workflows in minutes.
